visual.name: PowerBI-visuals-spline
visual.description:
Smoothing spline helps you visualize and understand noisy data. Control the colors and the rest of attributes to meet your specific needs.

Service prerequisites: R-powered custom visual is used in service seamlessly

Desktop prerequisites: To run R scripts in Power BI Desktop, you must separately install R on your local computer.
You can download and install R for free from the Revolution Open download page or the CRAN Repository

R package dependencies(auto-installed): graphics, scales, reshape, ggplot2, htmlWidgets, XML, plotly

Supports R versions: R 3.3.1, R 3.3.0, MRO 3.3.1, MRO 3.3.0, MRO 3.2.2

dataRoles.description: Unique ID (optional). May be used to prevent two identical rows from being counted as one
dataRoles.name: unique_id

model.description: Target model: loess (Local Polynomial Regression Fitting) is default for small dataset; gam (Generalized Additive Model) is default for large dataset, lm (polynomial regression of certain degree)

pointColor.description: Used only if `Point Color` field is empty

cranPackages.name: reshape
cranPackages.displayName: reshape:  lets you flexibly restructure and aggregate data
